    • Method Detail

      • distrobuteAwards

        public static void distrobuteAwards(java.lang.Integer id)
        Determines what rewards to issue. This method is automatically called internally and should be ignored!!!!!

        This will NOT handle messages!
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the arena involved.

      • econAwards

        public static java.lang.Boolean econAwards(java.lang.Integer id)
        Issues the RewardEconomyEvent event at the end of a game.

        **DO NOT CALL THIS METHOD!!!** Listen to RewardEconomyEvent instead!!!.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arena involved.
        Returns:
        true if successful and not cancelled, else false.

      • itemAwards

        public static java.lang.Boolean itemAwards(java.lang.Integer id)
